description.originalText:
Hi Families! 
I had a really great experience with Sana. She took care of my son when my husband and I went out. This was our first meeting but she was warm and playful with my son and he let her put him to bed without any issues!  She listened to us share the routine and followed through so that our son was in bed at a good time. He told us he really liked her and we will hire her again!
Definitely recommend!

description.displayText: I thought I had hired Sana as my full-time nanny and we had arranged to meet for the first time a week before she was supposed to start. I text her with directions to my house and she did not respond. I messaged her on here and she read it and still did not respond. I messaged the next day and she finally said that she couldn't work for me. When was she going to let me know? We had this arranged for 3 weeks. Now I am a week from starting my new job with no childcare. I could have been looking elsewhere to find childcare had I known that she was looking for other jobs.

description.displayText: Sana was amazing with my 4yo son and 1 yo daughter. My son does not warm up to people easily but by the time we were ready to leave she had him so engaged he didn't even care that we were leaving. We came back and both kids were happily playing with her. She is very smart, kind and dependable. I would definitely hire her again!
